EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokION.XLE.Retail.N.G.N.17804.Retail Nurture.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Transforming Retail IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Digital transformation and the consumer experience Technology advancements and the integration of technology into the lives of consumers are driving your business and technology to transform. Customers expect a positive experience in all channels, in-store and online.
Read, “Why retailers need digital transformation <[[https://pages.nokia.com/18773.retail.digital.lp.html]]>,” and explore the technologies that will have the greatest impact on improving your customers' experience. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin
Head of Retail Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/retail <[[https://networks.nokia.com/retail]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
